i3zc.text:
Guide to button CSS color variables

--wcFont: Original font color
--wcFontOH: On hover font color
--wcMain: Original background color
--wcMainOH: On hover background color
--wcBorder: Original border color
--wcBorderOH: On hover border color

See JSON examples for usage

pyne.text:
Guide to button color properties

textColor: Original font color
textColorOH: On hover font color
backgroundColor: Original background color
backgroundColorOH: On hover background color
borderColor: Original border color
borderColorOH: On hover border color

See JSON examples for usage

ma9w.text: To change colors, you can use either the properties of the button itself (list to the left) or the CSS property with predefined replacement words (list to the right). You do not need to and should not use both at the same time.

sdfs.text:
Link between both approaches

Property                  -> CSS variable associated: Function

textColor                 -> --wcFont: Original font color
textColorOH           -> --wcFontOH: On hover font color
backgroundColor  -> --wcMain: Original background color
borderColorOH      -> --wcMainOH: On hover background color
borderColor            -> --wcBorder: Original border color
borderColorOH      -> --wcBorderOH: On hover border color
